thread.title: Suspect identified in fatal shooting at Northern Arizona University
thread.title_full: Suspect identified in fatal shooting at Northern Arizona University

title: Suspect identified in fatal shooting at Northern Arizona University
text:
Suspect identified in fatal shooting ... Suspect identified in fatal shooting at Northern Arizona University 5 hrs ago Read more: Los Angeles Times 
An 18-year-old freshman at Northern Arizona University opened fire on a group of students after a late-night conflict in a parking lot, leaving one student dead and three others injured, university officials said Friday. The shooter, identified by campus police as Steven Jones, surrendered his handgun to campus police and was taken into custody not long after the 1:20 a.m. incident, authorities said. Start the conversation, or Read more at Los Angeles Times.
